name: create_histogram_from_database
description: Generate a histogram from a numeric column in an SQLite database table or JOIN query, with optional filtering and bin settings.

database_path.description: Path to the SQLite database file.

from_clause.description: Main table or JOIN clause to select from.

column_to_plot.description: Name of the numeric column to generate the histogram from.

where_params.description: Optional parameters to bind into the WHERE clause.

bins.description: Number of bins in the histogram.

save_path.description: Path where the chart image will be saved.
